Brethren and sisters, I entreat you to "examine yourselves, whether ye be in the faith; prove your own selves." To maintain 
                                                                           104
the warmth and purity of Christian love requires a constant supply of the grace of Christ. Have you employed every means that your "love may abound yet more and more," "that ye may approve things that are excellent," and be filled with the fruits of righteousness "which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God"?
